remarks: Lemma for ~ basel .  The function ` 1 + A x. G ` for any fixed ` A ` goes to ` 1 ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
statement:
basel.g $e |- G = ( n e. NN |-> ( 1 / ( ( 2 x. n ) + 1 ) ) ) $.
